title: Bogomolny Yang-Mills-Higgs Solutions in (2+1) anti-de Sitter Space
abstract: This paper investigates an integrable system which is related to hyperbolic monopoles; ie the Bogomolny Yang-Mills-Higgs equations in (2+1) anti-de Sitter space which are integrable and whose solutions can be obtained using analytical methods. In particular, families of soliton solutions have been constructed explicitly and their dynamics has been investigated in some detail.
